00051 HsCommandInterpreter::HsCommandInterpreter(Session* session)
00052     : m_session(session) {

00056 void HsCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00057   String out_str;
00058   ParserState state;
00059   Parser parser(state);
00060   parse_info<> info;
00061 
00062   info = parse(line.c_str(), parser, space_p);
00063 
00064   if (info.full) {
00065 
00066     if (state.command == COMMAND_MKDIR) {
00067       String fname = state.dir_name;
00068       m_session->mkdir(fname);
00069     }
00070 
00071     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DELETE) {
00072       String fname = state.node_name;
00073       m_session->unlink(fname);
00074     }
00075 
00076     else if (state.command == COMMAND_OPEN) {
00077       uint64_t handle;
00078       int event_mask = state.event_mask;
00079       int open_flag = state.open_flag;
00080       String fname = state.node_name;
00081 
00082       if(open_flag == 0) // read is default
00083         open_flag = OPEN_FLAG_READ;
00084 
00085       if(fname == "")
00086         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CLI_PARSE_ERROR,
00087                  "Error: no filename supplied.");
00088 
00089       HandleCallbackPtr callback = new FileHandleCallback(event_mask);
00090       handle = m_session->open(fname,open_flag,callback);
00091 
00092       // store opened handle in global HsClientState namespace
00093       String normal_name;
00094       Util::normalize_pathname(fname,normal_name);
00095       HsClientState::file_map[normal_name] = handle;
00096     }
00097 
00098     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CREATE) {
00099       uint64_t handle;
00100       int event_mask = state.event_mask;
00101       int open_flag = state.open_flag;
00102       String fname = state.file_name;
00103 
00104       if(open_flag == 0)
00105         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CLI_PARSE_ERROR,
00106                  "Error: no flags supplied.");
00107       else if (fname == "")
00108         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CLI_PARSE_ERROR,
00109                  "Error: no filename supplied.");
00110 
00111       HandleCallbackPtr callback = new FileHandleCallback(event_mask);
00112       handle = m_session->create(fname,open_flag,callback,state.attrs);
00113 
00114       // store opened handle in global HsClientState namespace
00115       String normal_name;
00116       Util::normalize_pathname(fname,normal_name);
00117       HsClientState::file_map[normal_name] = handle;
00118     }
00119 
00120     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CLOSE) {
00121       uint64_t handle;
00122       String fname = state.node_name;
00123       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00124       String normal_name;
00125       Util::normalize_pathname(fname,normal_name);
00126       HsClientState::file_map.erase(normal_name);
00127       m_session->close(handle);
00128     }
00129 
00130     else if (state.command == COMMAND_ATTRSET) {
00131       uint64_t handle;
00132       int size = state.last_attr_size;
00133       String name = state.last_attr_name;
00134       String value = state.last_attr_value;
00135       String fname = state.node_name;
00136       const char *val = value.c_str();
00137 
00138       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00139 
00140       m_session->attr_set(handle, name, val, size);
00141     }
00142 
00143     else if (state.command == COMMAND_ATTRGET) {
00144       uint64_t handle;
00145       String name = state.last_attr_name;
00146       String fname = state.node_name;
00147       DynamicBuffer value(0);
00148 
00149       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00150 
00151       m_session->attr_get(handle, name, value);
00152 
00153      String valstr = String((const char*)(value.base),value.fill());
00154      cout << valstr << endl;
00155 
00156     }
00157 
00158     else if (state.command == COMMAND_ATTRDEL) {
00159       uint64_t handle;
00160       String name = state.last_attr_name;
00161       String fname = state.node_name;
00162 
00163       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00164 
00165       m_session->attr_del(handle, name);
00166     }
00167 
00168     else if (state.command == COMMAND_EXISTS) {
00169       String fname = state.node_name;
00170 
00171       if(m_session->exists(fname)) {
00172         cout<< "true" << endl;
00173       }
00174       else {
00175         cout << "false" << endl;
00176         HsClientState::exit_status = 1;
00177       }
00178     }
00179 
00180     else if (state.command == COMMAND_READDIR) {
00181       uint64_t handle;
00182       vector<struct DirEntry> listing;
00183       String fname = state.dir_name;
00184 
00185       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00186       m_session->readdir(handle, listing);
00187 
00188       struct LtDirEntry ascending;
00189       sort(listing.begin(), listing.end(), ascending);
00190       for (size_t ii=0; ii<listing.size(); ii++) {
00191         if (listing[ii].is_dir)
00192           cout << "(dir) ";
00193         else
00194           cout << "      ";
00195         cout << listing[ii].name << endl ;
00196       }
00197       cout << flush ;
00198     }
00199 
00200     else if (state.command == COMMAND_LOCK) {
00201       uint64_t handle;
00202       uint32_t mode = state.lock_mode;
00203       String fname = state.node_name;
00204       struct LockSequencer lockseq;
00205 
00206       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00207 
00208       m_session->lock(handle, mode, &lockseq);
00209 
00210       cout << "SEQUENCER name=" << lockseq.name << " mode=" << lockseq.mode
00211            << " generation=" << lockseq.generation << endl;
00212     }
00213 
00214     else if (state.command == COMMAND_TRYLOCK) {
00215       uint64_t handle;
00216       uint32_t mode = state.lock_mode;
00217       String fname = state.node_name;
00218       struct LockSequencer lockseq;
00219       uint32_t status;
00220 
00221       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00222       m_session->try_lock(handle, mode, &status, &lockseq);
00223 
00224       if (status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED)
00225         cout << "SEQUENCER name=" << lockseq.name << " mode=" << lockseq.mode
00226              << " generation=" << lockseq.generation << endl;
00227       else if (status == LOCK_STATUS_BUSY)
00228         cout << "busy" << endl;
00229       else
00230         cout << "Unknown status: " << status << endl;
00231 
00232     }
00233 
00234     else if (state.command == COMMAND_RELEASE) {
00235       uint64_t handle;
00236       String fname = state.node_name;
00237 
00238       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00239 
00240       m_session->release(handle);
00241     }
00242 
00243     else if (state.command == COMMAND_GETSEQ) {
00244       uint64_t handle;
00245       struct LockSequencer lockseq;
00246       String fname = state.node_name;
00247 
00248       handle = Util::get_handle(fname);
00249 
00250       m_session->get_sequencer(handle, &lockseq);
00251 
00252       cout << "SEQUENCER name=" << lockseq.name << " mode=" << lockseq.mode
00253            << " generation=" << lockseq.generation << endl;
00254     }
00255 
00256     else if (state.command == COMMAND_ECHO) {
00257       String str = state.str;
00258 
00259       cout << str << endl;
00260     }
00261 
00262     else if (state.command == COMMAND_HELP) {
00263       const char **text = HsHelpText::get(state.help_str);
00264 
00265       if (text) {
00266         for (size_t i=0; text[i]; i++)
00267           cout << text[i] << endl;
00268       }
00269       else
00270         cout << endl << "no help for '" << state.help_str << "'\n" << endl;
00271     }
00272 
00273     else
00274       HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CLI_PARSE_ERROR, "unsupported command: "
00275                + line);
00276   }
00277   else
00278     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_CLI_PARSE_ERROR, "parse error at: %s",
00279               info.stop);
00280 }
